channel.title: 3 small issues I cannot find
channel.description:
I really hope this is the right place for these questions. If not, please point me in the right direction :)
1-I cannot find where the framework for the game is. Usually the images are found within the cache in the interface folders, etc. This one that I have has no images for the frame. I cannot figure out where it would be that I would change these to either the correct RS frames, or my own. Does anyone know where this would be found? These are definitely custom made.
2-I have never seen this interface appear when starting a game, until I got this client/server. where is this located, and how do I remove it? (image below)
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z2m5nk.jpg[/img]
This is the first full throttle game I am coding on my own. Though things are surprisingly easier than I thought, these two things have not been. I would not even mind being able to get it to NOT shut down after 2 minutes idle, but I can most likely find that :)

item.title: 3 small issues I cannot find
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

well obviously the source u dled was meant for fullscreen, and the jframe is set to reg resolution. search in the jframe if u need the actuall frame for youâ€™re server.

Read full topic
